title: How to read music: keyboard version
creator_credit: Harry Ratner, Frederick Noad, Omnibus Video and Fredereick Noad Productions
brief_description: An instructional video teaching the basics of reading music. The course covers: Pitch; Duration; Rests and ties; Familiar tunes; New time signatures; Sharps and flats; Chords and counterpoint; Both hands together. Frederick Noad, an outstanding all-round musician, takes you through each of the above points step-by-step with illustrated diagrams and demonstrations on the piano.
